net.sf.mmm.util.lang.api

Interface LocalizableFormatter<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - is the generic type of the actual value to format.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Formatter<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLocalizableFormatter, ComposedLocalizableFormatter

    public interface LocalizableFormatter<V>
extends Formatter<V>
    This is the interface for a Formatter that is localizable. Methods inherited from Formatter will use Locale.getDefault().
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void format(V value, Appendable buffer, Locale locale)
      This method formats the given value for the given locale and directly appends to the given buffer.
      String format(V value, Locale locale)
      This method formats the given value for the given locale.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.util.lang.api.Formatter

        format, format

    • Method Detail

      • format

        String format(V value,
              Locale locale)
        This method formats the given value for the given locale.
        This is a shorthand of the following code: 
         StringBuilder buffer = new StringBuilder();
 format(value, buffer, locale);
 return buffer.toString();
        Parameters:
        value - is the value to format. May be null.
        locale - is the Locale.
        Returns:
        the formatted value. If the given value is null, a legal implementation will return "null" or "".

      • format

        void format(V value,
            Appendable buffer,
            Locale locale)
     throws RuntimeIoException
        This method formats the given value for the given locale and directly appends to the given buffer.
        Parameters:
        value - is the value to format. May be null.
        buffer - is the Appendable to append the formatted value to.
        locale - is the Locale to use.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIoException - if append caused a IOException.
